entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of light snow beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing late in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:28 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near plus 3.
